009package _ImageJ_Examples;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015/**
016 * Updating the image.
017 * @author WB
018 */
019public class XY_Plugin implements PlugInFilter {
020        
021        ImagePlus im;
022
023        public int setup(String args, ImagePlus im) {
024                this.im = im;   // keep a reference to the ImagePlus object
025                return DOES_8G;
026        }
027
028        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
029                // ...  modify ip
030                im.updateAndDraw();     // redraw the image
031                // ...
032        }
033
034}
